## Assignment 3

1. Assigning and Evaluating Expression:
```{r}
x<-1.1
a<-2.2
b<-3.3

z1<-x^a^b
print (z1)

z2<-(x^a)^b 
print (z2)

z3<- 3*x^3 + 2*x^2 + 1
print (z3)

```
  
  2. Using rep and seq:
```{r}
# question 2
z4<- c(seq(8:1), rev(1:7))
print(z4) 

z5<- rep(1:5, 1:5)
print(z5)

x<- rev(1:5)
z6<- c(rep(x, 1:5))
print(z6)

```
  
3. Animal Story
```{r}

queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant")
print (queue)

#a
queue <- c("sheep", "fox", "owl", "ant", "serpent")
print (queue)
#b
queue[-c(1)]
#c
queue[1] <- "donkey" 
print (queue)
#d
length(queue)=4
print (queue)
#e
queue2 <- append(queue, "aphid", after = 3)
print(queue2)
#f
which(queue2=="aphid")
```
